SETS.LaTeX: \text{Let } I \text{ be the set of products} = \{\text{AppX}, \text{AppY}, \text{AppZ}, \text{AppW}, \text{AppV}\}

VARIABLES.name: y_{	ext{AppX}}
VARIABLES.description: Binary variable indicating whether AppX is developed (1 if yes, 0 if no)

VARIABLES.name: y_{	ext{AppY}}
VARIABLES.description: Binary variable indicating whether AppY is developed (1 if yes, 0 if no)

VARIABLES.name: y_{	ext{AppZ}}
VARIABLES.description: Binary variable indicating whether AppZ is developed (1 if yes, 0 if no)

VARIABLES.name: y_{	ext{AppW}}
VARIABLES.description: Binary variable indicating whether AppW is developed (1 if yes, 0 if no)

VARIABLES.name: y_{	ext{AppV}}
VARIABLES.description: Binary variable indicating whether AppV is developed (1 if yes, 0 if no)

VARIABLES.name: x_{	ext{AppX}}
VARIABLES.description: Number of development teams allocated to AppX

VARIABLES.name: x_{	ext{AppY}}
VARIABLES.description: Number of development teams allocated to AppY

VARIABLES.name: x_{	ext{AppZ}}
VARIABLES.description: Number of development teams allocated to AppZ

VARIABLES.name: x_{	ext{AppW}}
VARIABLES.description: Number of development teams allocated to AppW

VARIABLES.name: x_{	ext{AppV}}
VARIABLES.description: Number of development teams allocated to AppV

PARAMETERS.name: EstimatedRevenue_{	ext{AppX}}
PARAMETERS.description: Estimated Revenue per Team for AppX

PARAMETERS.name: DevelopmentCost_{	ext{AppX}}
PARAMETERS.description: Development Cost per Team for AppX

PARAMETERS.name: MarketingCost_{	ext{AppX}}
PARAMETERS.description: Marketing Cost per Team for AppX

PARAMETERS.name: EstimatedRevenue_{	ext{AppY}}
PARAMETERS.description: Estimated Revenue per Team for AppY
